member.summary: CellSettingsForDataRecord Attached Dependency Property

member.name: M:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.GetCellSettingsForDataRecord(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Returns the format settings applied to Word Table Cell that represents a given field.

remarks.p: All the word cells that are associated with a given will use these settings. To affect all DataRecords through out the control you can set this property on the . To affect all the DataRecords for a given , you can set this property on the . To affect cells for a specific , you can set this property on the of that Field.
Note: The settings for these properties will be merged together giving precedence to the Field's settings then the FieldLayout's FieldSettings and lastly by the DataPresenter's FieldSettings.

Note: The settings for these properties will be merged together giving precedence to the Field's settings then the FieldLayout's FieldSettings and lastly by the DataPresenter's FieldSettings.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.CellSettingsForLabelProperty
member.summary: CellSettingsForLabel Attached Dependency Property

member.name: M:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.GetCellSettingsForLabel(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Returns the format settings applied to a when exported to word.

remarks.p: All the word cells within a header record and all the labels within a record when the is InCells will use these settings. To affect all labels throughout the control you can set this property on the . To affect all the labels for a given , you can set this property on the . To affect labels for a specific , you can set this property on the of that Field.
To return the format settings for a , pass a reference to the FieldGroup instance.

Note: The settings for these properties will be merged together giving precedence to the Field's settings (or the FieldGroup if one is specified), then the FieldLayout's FieldSettings and lastly by the DataPresenter's FieldSettings.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.SetCellSettingsForLabel(System.Windows.DependencyObject,Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.WordTableCellSettings)
member.summary: Sets the format settings applied to a when exported to word.
member.param: The DependencyObject with which the specified value is to be associated. This parameter can be set to a instance, or a instance to apply formatting for multiple fields.
A reference to the instance which defines the format settings.

remarks.p: All the word cells within a header record and all the labels within a record when the is InCells will use these settings. To affect all labels through out the control you can set this property on the . To affect all the labels for a given , you can set this property on the . To affect labels for a specific , you can set this property on the of that Field.

Note: The settings for these properties will be merged together giving precedence to the Field's settings (or the FieldGroup if one is specified), then the FieldLayout's FieldSettings and lastly by the DataPresenter's FieldSettings.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.GetCellSettingsForSummaryRecord(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Returns the format settings applied to Word Table Cells that represents a .

remarks.p: All the word cells that are associated with a given SummaryRecord will use these settings. To affect all SummaryRecords through out the control you can set this property on the . To affect all the SummaryRecords for a given , you can set this property on the . To affect SummaryRecords positioned for a specific , you can set this property on the of that Field.
Note: This only affects the appearance of SummaryRecord objects and not the summaries that are displayed within a group by record even when the summaries are aligned to the cells.
Note: The settings for these properties will be merged together giving precedence to the Field's settings then the FieldLayout's FieldSettings and lastly by the DataPresenter's FieldSettings.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.GetIgnoreField(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets the IgnoreField property. This dependency property indicates whether the specified field should be collapsed/excluded from an export to Word using the DataPresenterWordWriter.
member.param: The DependencyObject from which to get the property. Currently supports FieldSettings and FieldGroup.

remarks.para: By default all fields that are displayed within the being exported are included in the output. Setting this property to false for a given will cause the export to set the to collapsed when the field is exported. In addition, any summaries, sorted fields and filter references are removed from the containing .

member.name: M:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.SetIgnoreField(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Sets the IgnoreField property. This dependency property indicates whether the associated field should be collapsed/excluded from an export to Word using the DataPresenterWordWriter.
member.param: The DependencyObject on which to set the property. Currently supports FieldSettings and FieldGroup.

remarks.para: By default all fields that are displayed within the being exported are included in the output. Setting this property to false for a given will cause the export to set the to collapsed when the field is exported. In addition, any summaries, sorted fields and filter references are removed from the containing .

member.name: M:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.CancelExport(Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.DataPresenterBase)
member.summary: Cancels any asynchronous export operations for the specified that were initiated by this instance.

remarks.p: An export operation may be canceled by handling the event and setting the to true. However, for an asynchronous export the operation may be pending while another asynchronous operation is pending or the export may still be preparing the source control. For those situations this method may be used to cancel the operation.

member.param: The datapresenter whose asynchronous export is to be canceled

member.summary: Occurs at the beginning of the export process. The has been initialized but the has not yet been set.

member.summary: Used to invoke the event.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.CellExporting
member.summary: Occurs when a of a is about to be written to the Word document.

remarks.p: This event provides an opportunity to change the that will written out for the specified cell.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.OnExportEnding(Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.ExportEndingEventArgs)
member.summary: Used to invoke the event.
member.param: Provides data for the event.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.ExportEnding
member.summary: Occurs at the end of the export process.

remarks.p: The ExportEnding event is invoked when the export process has completed to give the developer an opportunity to manipulate the Writer being used. This is particularly important when using an overload of the Export method that takes a filename as the file will be saved after the ExportEnding is complete but before the . Also, since the file will not have been created until after the ExportEnding, if you wanted to copy the file to another location or display the file to the end user, the ExportEnded event should be used to do that.
The property can be used to determine if the export operation was canceled.
Note: The of the will be invoked after this event is raised if the DataPresenterWordWriter created the writer.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.OnExportEnded(Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.ExportEndedEventArgs)
member.summary: Used to invoke the event.
member.param: Provides data for the event.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.ExportEnded
member.summary: Occurs after the export process has completed.

remarks.p: The ExportEnded event is raised after the export process has been completed. If an overload of the Export method that accepts a filename was used, then the file would be available at this point since the file is saved after the event has been completed but before the ExportEnded. Therefore any manipulations of the Writer should be done in the event.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.OnInitializeRecord(Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.InitializeRecordEventArgs)
member.summary: Used to invoke the event.
member.param: Provides data for the event.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.InitializeRecord
member.summary: Occurs when a record is about to be processed.

remarks.p: The exposes properties that can be used to prevent the current record, its descendants or its siblings from being exported. The property can be set to true to end the export operation.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.OnLabelExporting(Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.LabelExportingEventArgs)
member.summary: Used to invoke the event.
member.param: Provides data for the event.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.LabelExporting
member.summary: Occurs when the of a is about to be written to the Word document.

remarks.p: This event provides an opportunity to change the that will written out for the specified Field label.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.OnSummaryResultsExporting(Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.SummaryResultsExportingEventArgs)
member.summary: Used to invoke the event.
member.param: Provides data for the event.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.DataPresenterWordWriter.SummaryResultsExporting
member.summary: Occurs when one or more instances are being written to the Word document.

remarks.p: This event provides an opportunity to change the that will written out based upon the specified . The results are aggregated together for a given or based upon the resolved SummaryPosition. For example the event will be raised once for all summaries within a SummaryRecord whose SummaryPosition is set to Left, Center or Right. It will also be raised for each Field that has summaries positioned based on the Field location.
Note: The event is not raised for any position for which there are no summaries.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.WordParagraphLineSpacingRule
member.summary: Enumeration used to indicate the type of line spacing in a paragraph.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.WordParagraphLineSpacingRule.Auto
member.summary: Specifies that the spacing between lines in a paragraph is expressed as a multiple of the line height for the paragraph.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.WordParagraphLineSpacingRule.AtLeast
member.summary: Specifies that the spacing between lines in a paragraph is at least the specified value.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.WordParagraphLineSpacingRule.Exact
member.summary: Specifies that the spacing between lines in a paragraph is exactly the specified value.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.ExportEndedEventArgs.CancelInfo
member.summary: Returns an object that provides information about action that canceled the export.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.ExportEndedEventArgs.Canceled
member.summary: Returns a boolean indicating if the export operation was canceled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.ExportEndedEventArgs.Source
member.summary: Returns the passed into the method.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.InitializeRecordEventArgs
member.summary: Event parameters used for the event.

member.summary: Returns the record that is going to be exported.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.InitializeRecordEventArgs.SkipDescendants
member.summary: Specifies whether to skip the descendants of the current record.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.InitializeRecordEventArgs.SkipRecord
member.summary: Specifies whether to skip the current record.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.InitializeRecordEventArgs.SkipSiblings
member.summary: Specifies whether to skip sibling records of the current record.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.InitializeRecordEventArgs.TerminateExport
member.summary: Specifies whether to terminate the export process. The current record will not be processed.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.CellExportingEventArgsBase
member.summary: Base class for an export event involving a value of a record.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.CellExportingEventArgsBase.CellSettings
member.summary: Returns the resolved settings to be applied to the cell.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.CellExportingEventArgsBase.Field
member.summary: Returns the Field associated with the value being exported or null if there is no field associated with the value.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.CellExportingEventArgsBase.Record
member.summary: Returns the associated Record.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.CellExportingEventArgsBase.Value
member.summary: Returns or sets the value that should be written for the cell.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.CellExportingEventArgs
member.summary: Event arguments for the event

remarks.p: Note: The does not necessarily represent the . Instead it returns the formatted display text as provided by the ValueEditor associated with the Field.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.CellExportingEventArgs.Cell
member.summary: Returns the cell whose value is being exported.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.CellExportingEventArgs.Record
member.summary: Returns the DataRecord whose cell is being exported.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.LabelExportingEventArgs
member.summary: Event arguments for the event

remarks.p: Note: the property returns the record for which the header is being generated. Depending on setting of the DataPresenter being exported the header may be separated from the record (e.g. if the ChildRecordsDisplayOrder is BeforeParent.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.LabelExportingEventArgs.FieldGroup
member.summary: Returns a reference to the FieldGroup associated with this event, or null if this event is not associated with any FieldGroup.

remarks.p: In the case where the associated DataPresenterBase-derived control has grouped columns, this event occurs when the label for a column group is exported.
When this property returns a reference to a FieldGroup, the CellExportingEventArgsBase.Field property returns null. If this event is not associated with a group, this property returns null.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.SummaryResultsExportingEventArgs
member.summary: Event arguments for the event

remarks.p: The property returns the record associated with the summaries and could be either a or a although it is possible that in future this could return another type if required.
The property represents the Field with which the summaries are being aligned when the is set to UseSummaryPositionField and will be null for all other cases.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.SummaryResultsExportingEventArgs.Position
member.summary: Returns an enumeration indicating the position of the summary.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.SummaryResultsExportingEventArgs.SummaryResults
member.summary: Returns a read-only collection of the results being output.

member.summary: Returns or sets settings for the border of the cell.

member.summary: Identifies the dependency property

member.name: P:Infragistics.Windows.DataPresenter.WordWriter.WordTableCellSettings.HorizontalAlignment
member.summary: Returns or sets a value indicating how the cell content is arranged vertically.

remarks.p: Note: This property affects the alignment of the parapgraph and is provided as an easy way of initializing the horizontal alignment of the cell's content without setting the property. If the value of the is set on any of the when the properties are being resolved then that value will be taken first even if the HorizontalAlignment was set on the WordCellSettings of a Field's Settings and the Alignment was set on the ParagraphSettings of a WordCellSettings set on the FieldLayout's FieldSettings for example.
